English: Prime tortoise of the record bureau, Song dynasty historical encyclopedia of political essays, autobiography, memorials and decrees, compiled 1005-1013 under Wang Qinruo `王~`欽~`若~|`王~钦`若~ and Yang Yi `楊億~|杨亿, 1000 scrolls
